name: Warrior
description: A strong and brave fighter skilled in hand-to-hand combat. Warriors are known for their physical strength and ability to wear heavy armor and wield various weapons.

name: Mage
description: A wielder of arcane powers, capable of casting powerful spells. Mages often have a deep knowledge of ancient lore and mystical artifacts.

name: Rogue
description: A cunning and agile character, adept in stealth and surprise attacks. Rogues are skilled in lockpicking, pickpocketing, and finding traps.

name: Healer
description: A compassionate and skilled medic who can heal wounds and cure diseases. Healers are essential in supporting their team in and out of battle.

name: Ranger
description: A master of survival and tracking in the wilderness. Rangers are skilled in archery, animal handling, and navigating through natural terrains.

name: Necromancer
description: A practitioner of dark arts, able to summon and control the undead. Necromancers possess knowledge of forbidden spells and curses.

name: Paladin
description: A holy warrior imbued with divine powers. Paladins are dedicated to fighting evil, healing the innocent, and inspiring those around them.

name: Assassin
description: A master of deadly arts, specializing in quick and silent elimination of targets. Assassins are experts in poisons, daggers, and stealth tactics.

name: Bard
description: A charismatic performer with the power to inspire and manipulate through music and speech. Bards are knowledgeable in lore and skilled in diplomacy.

name: Alchemist
description: A scholar of chemical and magical sciences, capable of creating potions and elixirs. Alchemists are adept at manipulating physical and magical substances.
